fields.name: ApnsCertificate
fields.description: The APNS certificate. Specify if using Certificate Authentication Mode.

fields.name: AppId
fields.description: The issuer (iss) registered claim key. The value is a 10-character TeamId, obtained from your developer account. Specify if using Token Authentication Mode.

fields.name: AppName
fields.description: The name of the application or BundleId. Specify if using Token Authentication Mode.

fields.name: CertificateKey
fields.description: The APNS certificate password if it exists.

fields.name: Endpoint
fields.description: The APNS endpoint of this credential. If using Certificate Authentication Mode and Sandbox specify 'gateway.sandbox.push.apple.com'. If using Certificate Authentication Mode and Production specify 'gateway.push.apple.com'. If using Token Authentication Mode and Sandbox specify 'https://api.development.push.apple.com:443/3/device'. If using Token Authentication Mode and Production specify 'https://api.push.apple.com:443/3/device'.

fields.name: KeyId
fields.description: A 10-character key identifier (kid) key, obtained from your developer account. Specify if using Token Authentication Mode.

fields.name: Thumbprint
fields.description: The APNS certificate thumbprint. Specify if using Certificate Authentication Mode.

fields.name: Token
fields.description: Provider Authentication Token, obtained through your developer account. Specify if using Token Authentication Mode.
